effect.description: The identifier of the status effect.

duration.description: Determines the duration of the status effect (in ticks).

amplifier.description: Determines the strength of the status effect (0 being level 1).

is_ambient.description: Determines whether the particle effects of the status effect is less noticeable.

show_particles.description: Determines whether the status effect should display particle effects on the entity.

show_icon.description: Determines whether the status effect would display an icon on the HUD.
